attack-object.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control may alert on suspicious Unix shell and PHP execution. Mismatched script extensions may also generate alerts of suspicious activity. Only one of the technique's sub-techniques is covered, resulting in a score of Minimal.

attack-object.name: Exploitation for Privilege Escalation
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control may alert on suspicious arguments used to exploit Xorg vulnerabilities for privilege escalation.

attack-object.name: Account Manipulation
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control provides partial detection for only one of this technique's sub-techniques and does not cover most of its procedure examples, resulting in a score of Minimal.

attack-object.name: Boot or Logon Autostart Execution
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control is only relevant for Linux endpoint machines and the only sub-technique relevant for Linux is Kernel Modules and Extensions.

attack-object.name: Create Account
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control is only relevant for Linux endpoints, and it provides partial coverage for the only sub-technique relevant on Linux endpoints, Local Account.

attack-object.name: Server Software Component
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control provides coverage for the only sub-technique this control is relevant for, Web Shell, but that coverage is Minimal.

attack-object.name: Hide Artifacts
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control only provides coverage for a minority of this technique's relevant sub-techniques, resulting in a score of Minimal.

attack-object.name: Impair Defenses
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control only provides coverage for a miniority of the sub-techniques under this technique and provides no coverage for other relevant sub-techniques, such as Impair Command History Logging or Disable or Modify Tools, resulting in a score of Minimal.

attack-object.name: Indicator Removal on Host
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control is only relevant for Linux environments and provides partial coverage for multiple Linux-relevant sub-techniques.

attack-object.name: Obfuscated Files or Information
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control only provides detection coverage for the Compile After Delivery sub-technique while not providing detection for all other sub-techniques relevant to the Linux platform or most of its procedure examples. As a result of this minimal coverage, the overall score is assessed as Minimal.

attack-object.name: Brute Force
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control provides partial coverage for most of this technique's sub-techniques and procedures.

attack-object.name: OS Credential Dumping
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control is only relevant for Linux environments, and provides partial coverage for one of the technique's two Linux-relevant sub-techniques.

attack-object.name: Remote Services
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control is only relevant for Linux environments. Among the sub-techinques that are relevant for Linux, this control may only alert on SSH.

attack-object.name: Implant Container Image
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control may alert on suspicious container images running mining software or SSH servers. Privileged Docker containers and privileged commands running within containers may also be detected. These alerts are only generated on containers in Linux endpoint machines and not for containers running from Azure Docker deployment.

attack-object.name: Screen Capture
attack-object.value: Linux auditd alerts and Log Analytics agent integration
attack-object.comments: Detections are periodic at an unknown rate.
attack-object.score-comment: This control may alert on usage of a screenshot tool. Documentation is not provided on the logic for determining a screenshot tool.
